00055   enum Mac80211MessageKinds {
00056     //between MAC layers of two nodes
00057     RTS = LAST_BASE_MAC_MESSAGE_KIND, // request to send
00058     CTS,                 // clear to send
00059     ACK,                 // acknowledgement
00060     DATA,
00061     BROADCAST,
00062     LAST_MAC_80211_MESSAGE_KIND
00063   };
00064 protected:
00066     typedef std::list<Mac80211Pkt*> MacPktList;
00067 
00069     enum timerType {
00070       TIMEOUT,
00071       NAV
00072     };
00073 
00075     enum State {
00076       WFDATA = 0, // waiting for data packet
00077       QUIET = 1,  // waiting for the communication between two other nodes to end
00078       IDLE = 2,   // no packet to send, no packet receiving
00079       CONTEND = 3,// contention state (battle for the channel)
00080       WFCTS = 4,  // RTS sent, waiting for CTS
00081       WFACK = 5,  // DATA packet sent, waiting for ACK
00082       BUSY = 6    // during transmission of an ACK or a BROADCAST packet
00083     };
00084 
00086     struct NeighborEntry {
00088       LAddress::L2Type address;
00089         int              fsc;
00090         simtime_t        age;
00091         double           bitrate;
00092 
00093         NeighborEntry() : address(), fsc(0), age(), bitrate(0) {}
00094     };
00095 
00097     typedef std::list<NeighborEntry> NeighborList;
00098

00197     bool rtsCts(Mac80211Pkt* m) {
00198         return m->getBitLength() - MAC80211_HEADER_LENGTH > rtsCtsThreshold;
00199     }
00200 
00202     void suspendContention();

00211     NeighborList::iterator findNeighbor(const LAddress::L2Type& address)  {
00212         NeighborList::iterator it;
00213         for(it = neighbors.begin(); it != neighbors.end(); ++it) {
00214             if(it->address == address) break;
00215         }
00216         return it;
00217     }
00218 
00220     NeighborList::iterator findOldestNeighbor() {
00221         NeighborList::iterator it = neighbors.begin();
00222         NeighborList::iterator oldIt = neighbors.begin();
00223         simtime_t age = it->age;
00224         for(; it != neighbors.end(); ++it) {
00225             if(it->age < age) {
00226                 age = it->age;
00227                 oldIt = it;
00228             }
00229         }
00230         return oldIt;
00231     }
00232
